UPLOAD DOWNLOAD RESET If you want to keep the keymap of other Gameloop applications, it is worth uploading the current configuration. You can find the configuration file here:\nC:\\Users\\username\\AppData\\Roaming\\AndroidTbox\\TVM_100.xml To apply the changes, replace the following file with the newly downloaded version:\nC:\\Users\\username\\AppData\\Roaming\\AndroidTbox\\TVM_100.xml\nImportant: For proper operation, close Gameloop completely, including the small icon in the system tray, before replace the file. Upload completed!
Multi Player Battle Royale Zombie Gundam
Changes: Execution fixed, hip fire options added, go down with Hawk X3 added.
Changes: New powerful armor and grenade buttons, execution fixed, hip fire option added, unlimited RPD fixed.-
Changes: Right mouse click added to secondary weapon.
Enables hip fire for score streaks and operator skills, but disables the 1-tap ADS mode.
Enables hip fire for annihilator, but disables the 1-tap ADS mode.

Tip: You can create a desktop shortcut to quickly launch CODM using the following path:\n"C:\\Program Files\\TxGameAssistant\\ui\\AndroidEmulatorEn.exe" -cmd StartApk -param -startpkg com.activision.callofduty.shooter -engine aow -vm 100
